title: Content Creation: Monetize by Regenerating Video and Audio 105
headline: This free online course will teach you to repurpose content while employing a proven distribution strategy.
description: Reformatting existing content to be utilized in a different context than its original purpose or to provide information to a new target audience is called ‘repurposing material’. It is also known as ‘content recycling’ and it is the technique of reusing content’s elements to broaden its reach while providing the optimum experience for an audience. It is possible to rework the same content in many different ways and this course will show you how.
courseDescription:
The more channels you can create for your message to reach its target, the more likely it will be seen, as is the case with other marketing endeavours. Instead of beginning from scratch, reusing old content saves time and delivers better outcomes faster. Furthermore, reusing an item requires less effort than creating a new post or episode. This course aims to help you understand how to turn one piece of content into many by presenting you with several distribution strategies.

It starts by outlining the potential of Amazon Prime Video Direct. By 2021, Amazon Prime Video had 175 million customers in 22 countries. We will explain how to prepare, upload and monetize Amazon Prime Video material to take advantage of this tremendous opportunity. You will also discover the prerequisites for Amazon Prime Video and why such a high entry barrier can be beneficial. Then we will explore some of the most frequently asked questions about content creation and marketing on YouTube and in general.

The final section outlines how to take one piece of content you have created and turn it into sixteen different parts across platforms. Repurposing material is an excellent way to extend the life of your existing audio and video assets.  Enroll in this course to understand how to start repurposing material now so that you will not have to start from scratch the next time you need to create fresh content.
